title: Hello World!
content:
Introducing Exercard! This is a free, open-source flashcard app designed to make learning more efficient with personalized spaced repetition. With AI-powered features and cross-platform support, Exercard helps you study smarter and retain information better.

Stay tuned for more updates and a Merry Christmas! 🎄🎁

title: Creating the reviewing process
content:
With the last sprint of the 2024 coming to its end. I'm very glad with the progress I've made. 😊

The previous sprint was mainly about creating decks and creating cards, but that was about it. Not very interesting for the user. This sprint included a lot more main ideas. 💡

  • Implement SM-2 as the first SRS algorithm
  • Create front-end functionality for reviewing cards
  • Beautify the reviewing process using animations and styling
  • Create SSR blog (Which you are reading now!📝)
At first I wanted to implement FSRS as the first algorithm, since I find it to be a much more modern alternative, but I ran into a lot of trouble actually understanding it (mainly the mathematical side) and after a couple of days concluded that for now I will implement SM-2 and before the alpha release of Exercard, dedicate an entire sprint to also including FSRS and turning it into the default algorithm used. (While still leaving SM-2 so that users can decide which algorithm they use)

Besides that, I'm very glad with how everything turned out.

I wish you all a happy 2025, I will see you next year

Eben
